channel.title: Is This How You Setup A No-Ip Server?
channel.description:
Hi i'm IAsk, Can someone tell me if i'm working this correctly.
I go to [url=http://No-Ip.Com.]No-Ip.Com.[/url] I register an account. I look down the side. I find Add. I put my Hostname as StarScape. I then change the list to, No-ip.com. I leave Host Type. I minimize [url=http://No-Ip.Com.]No-Ip.Com.[/url] I then bring up a new Internet Explorer. I then go to [url=http://WhatIsMyIp.Com]WhatIsMyIp.Com[/url] / [url=http://IpChicken.Com]IpChicken.Com[/url] I find out my Ip Adress. I maximize [url=http://No-Ip.Com.]No-Ip.Com.[/url] I then paste my Ip Adress into the Ip Adress box. I leave the rest. I click Create Host.
Can someone tell me if that is correct.
Thankyou.

item.title: Is This How You Setup A No-Ip Server?
item.dc:creator: @IAsk IAsk
item.description:
@IAsk wrote:

Eh,
So that Ip Adress that is already in the box,
Is that mine ?

Read full topic
item.source: Is This How You Setup A No-Ip Server?

item.title: Is This How You Setup A No-Ip Server?
item.dc:creator: @IAsk IAsk
item.description:
@IAsk wrote:

Hi i’m IAsk,
Can someone tell me if i’m working this correctly.

I go to No-Ip.Com.
I register an account.
I look down the side.
I find Add.
I put my Hostname as StarScape.
I then change the list to, No-ip.com.
I leave Host Type.
I minimize No-Ip.Com.
I then bring up a new Internet Explorer.
I then go to WhatIsMyIp.Com / IpChicken.Com
I find out my Ip Adress.
I maximize No-Ip.Com.
I then paste my Ip Adress into the Ip Adress box.
I leave the rest.
I click Create Host.

Can someone tell me if that is correct.

Thankyou.

Read full topic
item.source: Is This How You Setup A No-Ip Server?
